traits.name: abrasive
traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

traits.name: absent-minded
traits.description: Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.

traits.name: abstinent
traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.

traits.name: abstinent
traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.

traits.name: academian
traits.description: Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.

traits.name: achillean
traits.description: Timmy is said to have been dipped in the river of death, he seems invulnerable in battle.

traits.name: actionboy
traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.

traits.name: actiongirl
traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.

traits.name: aesthete
traits.description: Timmy loves beautiful things, and really cares about how his enviroment looks.

traits.name: agile
traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.

traits.name: amateurhaggler
traits.description: Timmy likes to haggle. he gets better prices than most people.

traits.name: animalabhorrent
traits.description: Timmy just isn't an "animal person." he doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like him, either.

traits.name: animalaficionado
traits.description: Timmy loves animals. he doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.

traits.name: animalempathy
traits.description: Timmy is a friend to animals of all kinds. he would never harm them, and they would never harm him.

traits.name: animalfriend
traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. he gets bonuses to all animal interactions.

traits.name: animalhater
traits.description: Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.

traits.name: animallover
traits.description: Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.

traits.name: animalwhisperer
traits.description: Timmy has always known how to interact with and befriend animals.

traits.name: annoyingvoice
traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.

traits.name: anxious
traits.description: Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.

traits.name: aphrodite'sgrace
traits.description: So wondrous is Timmy to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.

traits.name: ares'wrath
traits.description: Feared by him enemies and worshiped by warriors, Timmy is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.

traits.name: artemis'blessing
traits.description: Timmy's natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led him to champion the hunt.

traits.name: artisan
traits.description: Timmy can move his hands with fine-grained precision.

traits.name: artisan
traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of art and beauty.

traits.name: ascetic
traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.

traits.name: asexual
traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

traits.name: athletic
traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.

traits.name: athletic
traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.

traits.name: athletic
traits.description: Timmy has honed his mind and body for most of his life.

traits.name: awkward
traits.description: The elephant in the room is named Timmy.

traits.name: badfighter
traits.description: Timmy has never been a good fighter. No matter how hard they work on their combat skills they are outclassed by people with the same or less training then them.

traits.name: beautiful
traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.

traits.name: berserker
traits.description: Timmy has a fury simmering deep within him. In combat, he may fly into a berserker rage, becoming an uncontrollable whirlwind of destruction.

traits.name: big-boned
traits.description: Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.

traits.name: bisexual
traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.

traits.name: blackthumb
traits.description: Timmy can't work with plants well, They preform poorly to anything plant related no matter how good their knowledge about plants are.

traits.name: bloodlust
traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

traits.name: bodypurist
traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.

traits.name: boring
traits.description: Timmy justs keeps talking in one long incredibly unbroken sentence moving from topic to topic so that no-one has a chance to interrupt; it is really quite hypnotic.

traits.name: botanist
traits.description: Timmy is a professional botanist and knows the peculiarities of most plants.

traits.name: brave
traits.description: Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.

traits.name: brawler
traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

traits.name: brownthumb
traits.description: Timmy is a terrible gardener. The only thing he seems able to grow is weeds.

traits.name: builder
traits.description: Timmy loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But he tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.

traits.name: butcher
traits.description: Timmy enjoys preparing meat for cooking. his butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if he's dealing with animal corpses. he's terrible with mechanoids.

traits.name: cannibal
traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.

traits.name: caravaneer
traits.description: Timmy has a natural talent for logistics. his leadership allows caravans to move 15% faster.

traits.name: carefulshooter
traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

traits.name: carefulsurgeon
traits.description: Timmy takes medicine very seriously. he wants to do no harm and isn't afraid to take longer to do the job right.

traits.name: catperson
traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.

traits.name: charismatic
traits.description: Timmy has a shining personality. his words can get through to others more than usual.

traits.name: charismatic
traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. he gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.

traits.name: charismatic
traits.description: Timmy is very charismatic they can usualy talk to and negotiate with people well.

traits.name: chef
traits.description: Timmy is a great cook and can make really delicious dishes.

traits.name: chemicalfascination
traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

traits.name: chemicalinterest
traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

traits.name: chronicallyill
traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.

traits.name: chronicallyill
traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.

traits.name: claustrophobic
traits.description: Timmy is claustrophobic. he is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.

traits.name: clean
traits.description: Timmy is fastidious to a fault.

traits.name: clumsy
traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.

traits.name: clumsy
traits.description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.

traits.name: clumsy
traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.

traits.name: coldinclined
traits.description: Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.

traits.name: coldintolerant
traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.

traits.name: coldintolerant
traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.

traits.name: coldlover
traits.description: Timmy loves colder temperatures. he'll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.

traits.name: coldtolerant
traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.

traits.name: coldtolerant
traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.

traits.name: commander
traits.description: Timmy is an effective leader in ranged combat. Colonists around Timmy have better aim.

traits.name: composed
traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.

traits.name: composed
traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.

traits.name: conductor
traits.description: Timmy leads the movement of others well. Colonists around Timmy move faster.

traits.name: confident
traits.description: Timmy is confident that everything will work out for the best.

traits.name: cool-skinned
traits.description: Timmy is naturally cool and handles warm temperatures better than most.

traits.name: coordinated
traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than his peers.

traits.name: coordinated
traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than his peers.

traits.name: coordinated
traits.description: Timmy is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.

traits.name: couchpotato
traits.description: An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.

traits.name: coward
traits.description: While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.

traits.name: crackshot
traits.description: Timmy has exceptional hand-eye coordination and can quickly put his sights on a target.

traits.name: crafter
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter, and can work both fast and skillfully.

traits.name: cranialnervepalsy
traits.description: Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.

traits.name: craven
traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.

traits.name: craven
traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.

traits.name: creative(outdated)
traits.description: Timmy has a lot of creative power. he is very good at making unique works of art, as well as discovering new ways of solving problems.

traits.name: creepybreathing
traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

traits.name: deadshot
traits.description: Timmy knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.

traits.name: decentlearner
traits.description: Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.

traits.name: deepdriller
traits.description: Timmy has an extensive knowledge of geology and uses that to his advantage.

traits.name: deepsleeper
traits.description: Timmy can sleep through anything.

traits.name: deftlydodger
traits.description: Timmy has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.

traits.name: depressive
traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

traits.name: desensitized
traits.description: Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.

traits.name: dexterous
traits.description: Timmy demonstrates neat skill, especially with his hands.

traits.name: diplomat
traits.description: Timmy is very charismatic and can bend other people to their will.

traits.name: diplomat
traits.description: Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.

traits.name: diplomatic
traits.description: Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.

traits.name: dogperson
traits.description: Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.

traits.name: dopaminedeprived
traits.description: Timmy's brain is wired diffrently and wont release a healthy amount of dopamine resulting in unyielding depression. Over the years Timmy has developed an Ironclad resolve as a makeshift way to manage the saddness

traits.name: drunkenmaster
traits.description: Timmy is a master of Zuì Quán: drunken boxing. Or at least, it seems that way when he's wasted. The more he drinks, the better he fights.

traits.name: drunkenmaster
traits.description: Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.

traits.name: duelist
traits.description: Timmy is skilled at fighting in close-quarters.

traits.name: dullard
traits.description: Timmy is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.

traits.name: dunce
traits.description: Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.

traits.name: eagle-eyed
traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.

traits.name: eccentric
traits.description: Timmy Acts abnormally, probably due to their oddly high intelligence. he often makes a larger impact socially... For better or worse. Timmy is so out of the social loop, he doesn't realise when he is being insulted.

traits.name: eccentric
traits.description: Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.

traits.name: ecologist
traits.description: Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.

traits.name: efficient
traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.

traits.name: efficient
traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.

traits.name: efficientbuilder
traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to waste materials. he takes great care in his work.

traits.name: enduring
traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.

traits.name: energetic
traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.

traits.name: energetic
traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.

traits.name: farsighted
traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.

traits.name: farsighted
traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.

traits.name: fasthands
traits.description: Timmy has nimble hands and works at a rapid pace.

traits.name: fastlearner
traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.

traits.name: fastmetabolisim
traits.description: Timmy has a fast metabolisim and processes food quickly.

traits.name: fastminer
traits.description: Timmy knows how to exploit the cleavage of rocks. he doesn't understand why plants are so much more fragile though.

traits.name: fastwalker
traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.

traits.name: feeble
traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take him out of action.

traits.name: feeble
traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take him out of action.

traits.name: fieldmedic
traits.description: Timmy sacrifices treatment quality to save as many lives as possible.

traits.name: fighter
traits.description: Timmy has a heavy hand to deliver pain to the enemies.

traits.name: foreman
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled builder, turning the most complicated plans into reality.

traits.name: fortunefinder
traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.

traits.name: fragile
traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.

traits.name: fragile
traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.

traits.name: frail
traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.

traits.name: frail
traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.

traits.name: frailback
traits.description: Timmy has a frail back so he can't carry as much as the average person.

traits.name: fun-loving
traits.description: Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.

traits.name: gastronomist
traits.description: In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.

traits.name: gay
traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.

traits.name: geniusinventor
traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in the mind of Timmy. Researching new technology comes easily to Timmy, but he always seems distracted.

traits.name: ghoulish
traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.

traits.name: giantism
traits.description: A Giants with giantism is said to grow up to 30 feet. Not only his heights, but his skin grows thicker. To compensate for such growth, Timmy must eat more.

traits.name: gifted
traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, he gets a headstart before everyone else.

traits.name: gifted
traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, he gets a headstart before everyone else.

traits.name: glassbones
traits.description: Timmy was born with a physically weak body and injuries that would give one person a semmi-bad bruse will give Timmy a broken bone.

traits.name: glutton
traits.description: Timmy devours his meals much faster than others.

traits.name: glutton
traits.description: Some people use a spoon to eat. Timmy uses a shovel...

traits.name: god
traits.description: Timmy is basically a God.

traits.name: godlike
traits.description: Timmy's abilities resemble that of a god.

traits.name: goodfighter
traits.description: Timmy has always been a natural at fighting whether it be with ranged weapons, melee or just strait throwing hands.

traits.name: goodhygiene
traits.description: Timmy takes care of his personal hygiene.

traits.name: goodhygiene
traits.description: Timmy takes care of his personal hygiene.

traits.name: gourmand
traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

traits.name: gourmet
traits.description: Timmy has a passion for food preparation. his culinary creations are quite tasty, but he tends to take a while getting them "just right."

traits.name: greatmemory
traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.

traits.name: greedy
traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.

traits.name: greenthumb
traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he knows exactly what a plant needs to grow happily.

traits.name: greenthumb
traits.description: Timmy is a great gardener. The only thing he wants is a greener world.

traits.name: greenthumb
traits.description: Timmy can work with plants better than most people.

traits.name: groundbreaker
traits.description: Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.

traits.name: gunnut
traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns. he gets a mood bonus while holding a ranged weapon.

traits.name: gunslinger
traits.description: Timmy is a crackshot with a gun - or any ranged weapon for that matter.

traits.name: haggler
traits.description: Timmy likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. he tends to get better prices than most people.

traits.name: hagglingenthusiast
traits.description: Timmy always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.

traits.name: hardworker
traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

traits.name: hardy
traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.

traits.name: hardy
traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.

traits.name: hauler
traits.description: Timmy has a strong back, and can move fast even while carrying weight.

traits.name: healthy
traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.

traits.name: healthy
traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.

traits.name: heatinclined
traits.description: Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.

traits.name: heatintolerant
traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.

traits.name: heatintolerant
traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.

traits.name: heatlover
traits.description: Timmy loves the heat. he'll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.

traits.name: heattolerant
traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.

traits.name: heattolerant
traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.

traits.name: heavysleeper
traits.description: A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.

traits.name: heavysleeper
traits.description: Timmy could sleep through an earthquake.

traits.name: herbalist
traits.description: Timmy is good at working with plants, cutting down trees and harvesting crops.

traits.name: herculean
traits.description: Brave Timmy, born with impossible strength and force of will.

traits.name: hermit
traits.description: Timmy prefers being solitary. he is better at working with plants anyways.

traits.name: hot-skinned
traits.description: Timmy's body produces tremendous ammounts of heat. They are not bothered by temperatures which would send onother inot shivers, but they also dont like heat.

traits.name: hunter
traits.description: Timmy is good at hunting the big game, and can also train animals for various tasks.

traits.name: hyperhappy
traits.description: Timmy's brain is wired difrently and releases an excess amount of dopamine all the time. Timmy is always supper happy but when things finally hit the fan for them, they are prone to loosing it quickly.

traits.name: hypersexuality
traits.description: Timmy loves sex and always wants more. Can regain psyfocus only through sex.

traits.name: icy-skinned
traits.description: Timmy is a human icicle and loves hot weather- but doesn't handle cold very well.

traits.name: idealist
traits.description: Timmy refuses to accept less than his best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. he's less likely to fail when doing something, but he works slowly.

traits.name: idiotsavant
traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he learns twice as fast but works slower than normal, he is also incapable handling some tasks.

traits.name: imhotep'swisdom
traits.description: Timmy sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.

traits.name: immortal
traits.description: Timmy can't die.

traits.name: incompetent
traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.

traits.name: incompetent
traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.

traits.name: indifferent
traits.description: Timmy has seen a lot of death and pain. he's not a true psycopath and can enjoy socialization, but he's also not affected by the suffering of others.

traits.name: industrious
traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

traits.name: inefficient
traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.

traits.name: inefficient
traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.

traits.name: inept
traits.description: he means well, but Timmy is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.

traits.name: innocence
traits.description:
Timmy's heart has innocence. Maybe it's because you've never experienced a tough world before.
he will be more traumatized by violent acts such as cannibalism, organ harvesting and sight of dead bodies.

traits.name: insatiable
traits.description: No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.

traits.name: insomniac
traits.description: Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.

traits.name: intelligent
traits.description: Timmy is smarter than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.

traits.name: intimidating
traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.

traits.name: inventor
traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in Timmy's mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to him, but he always seems distracted.

traits.name: ironback
traits.description: Timmy is built like a mule, they have an extremely strong back this alows them to carry more wheight than others. Timmy's Iron back also alows them to sleep on the ground with no repercussions.

traits.name: ironman
traits.description: Timmy has a high tolerance for pain.

traits.name: ironstomach
traits.description: Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to he.

traits.name: iron-willed
traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

traits.name: jealous
traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

traits.name: jogger
traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

traits.name: juggernaut
traits.description: Whether due to strength, agility, or stupidity, Timmy cannot be stopped. he cannot be stunned, and will not be staggered by attacks.

traits.name: kind
traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally kind. he has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. he never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.

traits.name: kleptomaniac
traits.description: Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.

traits.name: lazy
traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.

traits.name: lombax
traits.description: Timmy is a lombax. he has an incredible natural inclination towards crafting, engineering and combat just like other representatives of his species.

traits.name: lonewolf
traits.description: Timmy prefers to stay alone - and is very good at that.

traits.name: lovedbyanimals
traits.description: Timmy is loved by animals, but people don't feel quite the same.

traits.name: lowpaintolerance
traits.description: Timmy will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.

traits.name: luminary
traits.description: For whatever reason, everyone seems to really care how Timmy is feeling.

traits.name: lush
traits.description: Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.

traits.name: madsurgeon
traits.description: Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.

traits.name: mammadidn'traisenoloser
traits.description: Timmy's mother didn't rase no loser. Timmy will tough it out and roll with the punches life thows at them.

traits.name: mammaraisedaloser
traits.description: Timmy's mother rase a loser. Timmy will complain and give up on most of the problems life thows at them.

traits.name: marksman
traits.description: Timmy is a talented marksman with a deadly aim.

traits.name: martialartist
traits.description: Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.

traits.name: masochist
traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.

traits.name: mason
traits.description: Timmy is very good at building structures, furniture and machinery.

traits.name: masterdiplomat
traits.description: Timmy has such a way with words that he always manages to cool down a tense situation. he could talk for days and people would still listen.

traits.name: mastermedic
traits.description: Timmy has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between his steady, skilled hands and his inspiring bedside manner, patients in his care will have little to fear.

traits.name: mastertrader
traits.description: Timmy always gets the best deals.

traits.name: meatshield
traits.description: Timmy is very brave and quite hard to kill.

traits.name: melodicvoice
traits.description: Timmy could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.

traits.name: menagerist
traits.description: Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.

traits.name: mercury'sblessing
traits.description: It is said that Timmy can leap the space between lightning and thunder, outfox the fox king, and reach tomorrow before the sun.

traits.name: miner
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled miner, and knows how to work with minerals.

traits.name: misandrist
traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.

traits.name: misogynist
traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.

traits.name: monsterhunter
traits.description: Timmy was titled a great warrior after striking down a dangerous beast single-handedly.

traits.name: morbid
traits.description: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. Timmy is fascinated by corpses and decay.

traits.name: mountainlover
traits.description: The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.

traits.name: muscular
traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around he find that rather attractive.

traits.name: muscular
traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around he find that rather attractive.

traits.name: naturalbutcher
traits.description: Sometimes it's hard to tell where the knife stops and Timmy starts. People like to say that "if it bleeds Timmy can skin it and split it".

traits.name: naturalgenius
traits.description: Timmy has an extraordinary intellect accompanied with mental instability.

traits.name: nearsighted
traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.

traits.name: nearsighted
traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.

traits.name: near-sighted
traits.description: Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless he is relatively close to it.

traits.name: neat
traits.description: Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.

traits.name: neatfreak
traits.description: Timmy is fastidious to a fault.

traits.name: necrophiliac
traits.description: Dead people can't say no, can they?

traits.name: nervous
traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.

traits.name: neurotic
traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.

traits.name: newtype
traits.description: Timmy awakened with a new type. he is amazing at dodging, and get +5 points for melee and shooting.

traits.name: nibbler
traits.description: Timmy picks at his food, taking extra time to finish his meals.

traits.name: nightowl
traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

traits.name: nimble
traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

traits.name: ninja-like
traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.

traits.name: nudist
traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

traits.name: nurse
traits.description: Timmy is good at taking care of wounds and diseases.

traits.name: nyctophile
traits.description: Timmy doesn't fear the dark at all.

traits.name: nyctophobe
traits.description: Timmy is really afraid of the dark.

traits.name: oblivious
traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he

traits.name: oceanlover
traits.description: The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.

traits.name: odyssean
traits.description: Craftier by far than any mortal man, Timmy is also a very capable warrior.

traits.name: optimist
traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.

traits.name: overweight
traits.description: Timmy is seriously overweight. he moves slowly, and works even slower.

traits.name: pacifist(medic)
traits.description: Timmy has been hurt by the harsh realities of this world, but he has decided to do something about it by becoming a medic and refusing violence under any circumstances. It's respectable, if dangerous on the Rim. No wonder Timmy is a bit neurotic.

traits.name: pacifist(scientist)
traits.description: Timmy has been hurt by the harsh realities of this world, and prefers to spend his days alone researching. It's a bit obsessive. No wonder Timmy is so bad with people.

traits.name: peasant
traits.description: Timmy rarely stands out and is overlooked by almost everyone he meets.

traits.name: peppy
traits.description: Timmy is full of energy. he will randomly gain the Frenzy Go Inspiration, even if he is not happy.

traits.name: perceptive
traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot a target.

traits.name: perceptive
traits.description: Timmy has a good awareness of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.

traits.name: perfectionist
traits.description: Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.

traits.name: persuasive
traits.description: Timmy often gets his way with things.

traits.name: persuasive
traits.description: Timmy often gets his way with things.

traits.name: persuasive
traits.description: Timmy is good at persuading someone to do or believe something through reasoning or the use of temptation.

traits.name: pervert
traits.description: Timmy is an extreme pervert. he doesn't mind sharing a room, or streaking. It makes others feel incredibly uncomfortable.

traits.name: pessimist
traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.

traits.name: petty
traits.description: Timmy is overtly concerned with social hitches. he tends to annoy others and can't stand his ex-lovers moving on.

traits.name: pharmacist
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled chemist and proficient in synthesizing drugs.

traits.name: pooraim
traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.

traits.name: poorhygiene
traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about his hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.

traits.name: poorhygiene
traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about his hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.

traits.name: poormedic
traits.description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. Timmy is one of those people.

traits.name: pretty
traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.

traits.name: prodigy
traits.description: Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.

traits.name: prude
traits.description: Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.

traits.name: psionic
traits.description: Timmy's mind is awaken to the psychic maelstrom.

traits.name: psychicallydeaf
traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychicallydull
traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive
traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychicallysensitive
traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

traits.name: psychopath
traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.

traits.name: pyromaniac
traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.

traits.name: quickhands
traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.

traits.name: quicklearner
traits.description: Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.

traits.name: quicksleeper
traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

traits.name: radresistant
traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.

traits.name: rancher
traits.description: Timmy is a passionate farmer, loving the smell of fresh hay and the sight of grazing animals.

traits.name: rapist
traits.description: Timmy doesn't take "No" as an answer.

traits.name: ravenous
traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.

traits.name: ravenous
traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.

traits.name: rebel
traits.description: Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.

traits.name: refinedpalate
traits.description: Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.

traits.name: researcher
traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent and can research really fast.

traits.name: resilient
traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since he was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.

traits.name: resilient
traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since he was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.

traits.name: restful
traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.

traits.name: restful
traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.

traits.name: restless
traits.description: Timmy often have a difficult time falling asleep.

traits.name: restless
traits.description: Timmy often have a difficult time falling asleep.

traits.name: robot
traits.description: NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.

traits.name: rockhound
traits.description: Timmy enjoys working with rocks. his mining speed is increased, but his lack of interest in other areas slows him down when doing other jobs. And he hates working with plants.

traits.name: rooted
traits.description: Timmy is part tree! he can really take a beating!

traits.name: rowdy
traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, he will sometimes start a fight just because he can.

traits.name: rowdy
traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, he will sometimes start a fight just because he can.

traits.name: sanguine
traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

traits.name: savant
traits.description: Timmy is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But he's almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.

traits.name: schizoid
traits.description: Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.

traits.name: scientist
traits.description: Timmy is quite smart, and can research faster as well as working with medical chemistry.

traits.name: scrapper
traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.

traits.name: scrounger
traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly.

traits.name: shepherd
traits.description: Timmy is really good at working with animals.

traits.name: shootingamateur
traits.description: Timmy has never held a gun in him hands. The weight of the cold metal in him hands makes he shudder uncontrollably.

traits.name: shootingenthusiast
traits.description: Timmy knows him way with a gun.

traits.name: shootingprofessional
traits.description: "My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - Timmy, probably.

traits.name: sickly
traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

traits.name: skilledmedic
traits.description: Timmy seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in his care will likely fare well.

traits.name: slob
traits.description: Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.

traits.name: slob
traits.description: Timmy is a complete slob. he tracks in dirt, tosses trash everywhere, and refuses to clean up.

traits.name: slothful
traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

traits.name: slowlearner
traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.

traits.name: slowmetabolisim
traits.description: Timmy has a slow metabolisim and takes longer to process food.

traits.name: slowpoke
traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.

traits.name: sluggish
traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...

traits.name: sluggish
traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...

traits.name: sluggish
traits.description: Timmy is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.

traits.name: smith
traits.description: Timmy is a skilled craftsman and knows how to handle various materials.

traits.name: snob
traits.description: Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.

traits.name: socialworker
traits.description: Timmy is tactful in his social interactions and uses it to his advantage.

traits.name: sous-chef
traits.description: Timmy handles ingredients with great care and prepares the most delicious meals.

traits.name: spawnofsatan
traits.description: Timmy bears the mark of the Prince of Darkness, the King of Hell, the Father of Lies: Lucifer himself. None know for what reason he has come to this world, or what dark plan he aims to enact, only that in his wake, death and destruction follow. Be afraid.

traits.name: squeamish
traits.description: Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for he.

traits.name: staggeringlyugly
traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.

traits.name: steadfast
traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

traits.name: steadyaim
traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.

traits.name: stiff
traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like he is souless.

traits.name: stiff
traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like he is souless.

traits.name: stoner
traits.description: Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.

traits.name: strongback
traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.

traits.name: strongconstitution
traits.description: Timmy's body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.

traits.name: stupid
traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.

traits.name: submissive
traits.description: Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.

traits.name: sucker
traits.description: They say a sucker is born every minute, and Timmy is that sucker.

traits.name: sucker
traits.description: Timmy just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. he'll pay more than he should, and still think that he got a good deal.

traits.name: super-immune
traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

traits.name: surgeon
traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of the body and can perform surgeries with higher accuracy and speed.

traits.name: swordsman
traits.description: Timmy is a natural born warrior and loves the thrill of fighting at close range.

traits.name: sylvanus'blessing
traits.description: Companion to all woodland creatures, both mundane and fantastic, Timmy protects and nurtures those that respect his domain.

traits.name: teacher
traits.description: Timmy loves to help people learn. he will teach a little something to everybody he talks to.

traits.name: technophobe
traits.description: Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.

traits.name: teetotaler

stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: temperatureintolerant
traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.

traits.name: temperatureintolerant
traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.

traits.name: temperaturetolerant
traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.

traits.name: temperaturetolerant
traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.

traits.name: tenaciousfighter
traits.description: Timmy has always had an ungodly affinity for fighting.

traits.name: thickskinned
traits.description: Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.

traits.name: thinskinned
traits.description: Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.

traits.name: toosmart
traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

traits.name: torturedartist
traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.

traits.name: tough
traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.

traits.name: transhumanist
traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.

traits.name: trigger-happy
traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

traits.name: tucker
traits.description: "That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - Timmy, probably.

traits.name: tycoon
traits.description: Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.

traits.name: tyrannic
traits.description: Timmy harshly criticizes and dictates the actions of others. Colonists around Timmy move and work faster, but receive a mood debuff from the added stress.

traits.name: ugly
traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

traits.name: unconvincing
traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in his life.

traits.name: unconvincing
traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in his life.

traits.name: uncouth
traits.description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? Timmy barely even understands the meaning of the words.

traits.name: uncouth
traits.description: Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, Timmy is not.

traits.name: undergrounder
traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.

traits.name: unstoppable
traits.description: Timmy has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. he is unlikely to be immobilized by it.

traits.name: valiant
traits.description: Timmy is brave, he would stand his where others would scramble and run.

traits.name: valiant
traits.description: Timmy is brave, he would stand his where others would scramble and run.

traits.name: vengeful
traits.description: Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.

traits.name: venturous
traits.description: Timmy loves to take risks and complete quests. he will recieve mood buffs for successful quests, and debuffs for failed quests.

traits.name: verycharismatic
traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.

traits.name: verydiplomatic
traits.description: Timmy has such a way with him words and gifts that he always manages to cool down a tense situation.

traits.name: veryenduring
traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.

traits.name: veryintelligent
traits.description: Timmy is very smart. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.

traits.name: veryintimidating
traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a big advantage in social interactions.

traits.name: veryneurotic
traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.

traits.name: veryperceptive
traits.description: Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.

traits.name: verystrongback
traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry twice as much as a normal person.

traits.name: volatile
traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.

traits.name: volatilecrafter
traits.description: Timmy is a genius crafter, and will often have creative inspiration. However, his mind is constantly ticking, making Timmy much more likely to have a mental break.

traits.name: vulcan'sfire
traits.description: Timmy crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.

traits.name: wanderlust
traits.description: Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.

traits.name: warm-skinned
traits.description: Timmy is naturally warm and handles cool temperatures better than most.

traits.name: weakconstitution
traits.description: Timmy is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.

traits.name: wimp
traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.

traits.name: wise
traits.description: Timmy maintains a clear state of mind and remains unfazed by the struggles of life.

traits.name: workaholic
traits.description: Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.

traits.name: worldweary
traits.description: Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.

traits.name: xenophile
traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.

traits.name: xenophobe
traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.

traits.name: zoophile
traits.description: Timmy likes to walk on the wild side.
